teams.loan_because:

teams.name: Intuit
teams.loan_because: Intuit is honored to dedicate the efforts of our Kiva lending team to the memory of our friend and colleague Anne Henderson. Anne passed away in September 2010 after a long battle with cancer. She was a bright light to everyone around her and was passionate about helping entrepreneurs through Kiva. We are inspired by her compassion, and are honored to continue her efforts to alleviate poverty. Anne, you will be greatly missed.
teams.description: At Intuit, corporate social responsibility is more than just a business practice, it's a longstanding part of who we are. It's our culture. It's one of our core values: We Care & Give Back. Anyone may join and invite others to join the Intuit lending team.

teams.name: Microsoft
teams.description: Employees of Microsoft who care about making the world a better place through loans.

teams.name: Super-Heroes!
teams.loan_because: There came a day, a day unlike any other, when Earth's mightiest heroes and heroines found themselves united against a common threat.
teams.description: Gathered together from the cosmic reaches of the universe, here in this great Hall of Justice, are the most powerful forces of good ever assembled! Dedicated to truth, justice and peace for all mankind! This is the Challenge of the Kiva Friends!

teams.name: Catholic Kiva
teams.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
teams.description: Anyone is welcome to join our group.  The team is just for fun and to help build community.

teams.name: Belgium
teams.loan_because: Its a nice way to help the beneficiaries of the loans create their own business and hopefully improve their lives.
teams.description: Team of the Belgian citizens & residents and of the fans of Belgian Waffles, Chocolate & Beers !

teams.description: We are kiva members from Flanders

teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.loan_because:
Honramos o legado deixado pelos nossos antepassados que espalharam cultura, conhecimento e valores por todo o mundo. Onde há um português, há um amigo pronto a ajudar e dar esperança aos que mais precisam. Isto é Portugal.

We honor the legacy of our ancestors who spread our culture, knowledge and values around the world. Wherever there is a Portuguese, there is a friend willing to help and give hope to those in need. This is Portugal.

We come together to make a change in our world.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

Toolkit for analyzing Kiva data:
http://build.kiva.org/

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Kiva Photographers
teams.loan_because: We realize that financial inclusion of the worlds poorest through microfinance can promote sustainable solutions and empowerment, and that photography is a powerful tool for telling the unheard stories of poverty.
teams.description: Extreme poverty is something that most in the developed world do not have to see very often. When it is visible, it is through the work of documentary photojournalists, videojournalists, etc...   This group is a place for amateurs and professionals alike who share a passion for photography and for social justice. As membership grows we can hopefully share some of our work that is relevant to what Kiva is doing.

teams.name: Netherlands
teams.loan_because: het mensen helpt een zelfstandig bestaan op te bouwen.
teams.description: FairSpirit microkrediet promoot Kiva in Nederland. Doe jij ook mee met het FairSpirit team?

teams.name: Friends of IMPRO
teams.loan_because: We want to help the small business entrepreneurs in La Paz

teams.name: Friends of Pro Mujer Bolivia
teams.loan_because: We want to support the businesses of the women who live in El Alto, Bolivia
teams.description: We loan to clients of Pro Mujer Bolivia, mainly women who own shops, stalls and workshops in the city of El Alto, Bolivia. Many are migrants from the countryside who have come to the city to improve the lives of their families.

teams.name: Humanist
teams.loan_because: It takes people to help people.  We believe in good.
teams.description:
Humanists strive to live good and ethical lives, with no belief in the supernatural.  We give meaning and purpose to our lives through reason, compassion and action.

Most Atheists and non-religious people ARE Humanists, but don't realize it!

Our team helps the poor, builds the Humanist community and shows that non-religious people give, care and share.

We are endorsed by the American Humanist Association, British Humanist Association and International Humanist and Ethical Union.

teams.name: Cheeseheads For Change
teams.loan_because: If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day.  Now in the modern world, you can give that same man a loan to buy a fishing pole, he catches fish with his new pole to feed his family, his community improves because of his financial success, he pays the loan back, and  you can re-loan that money again to help someone else buy a fishing pole . . . wait, that sounds like a conspiracy by the Rapala Corporation to sell more fishing equipment, what are we supporting here ;-)
teams.description: Our Kiva lending team is a non-political group consisting of Green Bay Packers fans lovingly known as Cheeseheads, and anyone who lives in or has ties to the great state of Wisconsin and is interested in making the world a better place.

teams.name: Canadian Mothers Helping Mothers
teams.loan_because: Having children makes us care even more than before about the children of the world.  We want to set a positive example of helping and hope for our own children.
teams.description: Mothers from Canada who want to help mothers and children around the world.  The team captain, Ruth, started by lending only $25 per month (in an effort to stave off lending addiction) and re-lending money as it came in.  She reached 100 loans in only 28 months!  You can do it too!

teams.loan_because: We live in a well-to-do nation and want to help those less fortunate than ourselves
teams.description: We are CANADIAN !!!

teams.name: Kiva Walk
teams.loan_because: Because we know the benefit of someone providing a 'hand up' both in our work and throughout our life.
teams.description: Founded by a 8.5 month walk across the USA in 2010, the KivaWalk Lending Team is a growing movement of Kiva champions that use walking to teach and instill Kiva's mission while also connecting us to the profound benefits of life at 3mph.

teams.name: Arizona State University (ASU) Students/Alumni
teams.loan_because: We're Devils that care!
teams.description: College students and alumni of ASU who donate to Kiva.org

teams.name: Let It We .org
teams.loan_because: Together we are wiser.
teams.description:
The collective intelligence of Kiva is untapped. We are trying to change this.

Each of us has an unique piece of wisdom. If we connect these pieces, everyone will win.

The whole is greater than the sum of all parts. Let's use our whole community to empower the poor of the world.

teams.name: Sanderson Family Farm
teams.loan_because: We have been blessed to be part of a caring family and want to share our good fortune with others.
teams.description: Our family has a farm that raises corn, wheat and soybeans.

teams.name: Portland Timbers Supporters
teams.loan_because: Sometimes a small thing you do can mean everything in another person's life.
teams.description: This group is for fans, supporters and admirers of our beloved Portland Timbers FC and the beautiful sport of soccer to come together to support those in need of help and encouragement by giving through Kiva.

teams.name: Washington State
teams.loan_because: Each of us has a responsibility to all of us.

teams.name: Go New Mexico!
teams.loan_because: We are from Albuquerque,  Santa Fe, Belen, Las Cruces, Corrales, Gallup, Hobbs, Placitas, Farmington, Rio Rancho, Silver City and all around the beautiful state of New Mexico and we want to create opportunity for others.  Go New Mexico!

teams.name: Maria Shriver + A Woman's Nation
teams.loan_because: For as little as $25, we can help women entrepreneurs right in our own backyard.
teams.description:
Continuing what she began as First Lady of California, Maria Shriver and A Woman’s Nation are partnering with Kiva, the world's first person-to-person microlending website, to empower thousands of women across America to become more financially independent. Our partnership shows that every loan you make to a woman entrepreneur – even $25 – will make a real difference. 

As "The Shriver Report: A Woman’s Nation Pushes Back from the Brink"* states, 1 in 3 American women lives on or near the brink of poverty. By starting or expanding her own business, a woman can lift herself and her family off the brink. JOIN US in moving women and families forward!

A Woman’s Nation™ is a nonprofit organization founded by Maria Shriver that imagines a new way forward for women and men, girls and boys. Through its multimedia initiatives and innovative partnerships, A Woman's Nation informs, inspires, and implements bold ideas into action with the goal of creating a culture where all lives and all work are respected, recognized, and valued. To learn more please visit AWomansNation.org.
 
* A project of A Woman's Nation, produced in partnership with Center for American Progress.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: TripAdvisor
teams.loan_because: TripAdvisor believes that travelers make a connection with the places and people they encounter around the world, and want to give back to those places and people in a meaningful way.
teams.description: As members of the TripAdvisor travel community, this team is excited to make a difference worldwide with support from TripAdvisor.

teams.name: Purdue University
teams.whereabouts: West Lafayette, Indiana, Earth, and Beyond!
teams.loan_because: As a land-grant university with a strong commitment to sustainable development around the world, we whole-heartily support efforts to help alleviate global poverty.
teams.description: The Purdue University Kiva Lending Team welcomes all students, faculty, staff, alumni and friends of Purdue University.

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Oregon State University
teams.loan_because: We understand the needs of those who are less fortunate, the drive for education and a better life, and the hope and happiness someone will feel when they receive these loans.
teams.description: We are a group of students, staff, and alumni from Oregon State University in Corvallis, Oregon, who feel the need to help others across the world.

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Indiana
teams.loan_because: We believe people around the world are connected and we can make a positive difference in others' lives.
teams.description:
Indiana is the 19th U.S. state and is located in the Midwest region of the United States of America. With over six million residents, it is ranked 15th in population and 17th in population density.

Indiana is a diverse state with a few large urban areas and a number of smaller industrial cities. It is best known for the Indianapolis 500 American automobile race, held annually over the Memorial Day weekend, and a strong basketball tradition, often called Hoosier Hysteria. Residents of Indiana are called Hoosiers. The state's name means "Land of the Indians."

Check out the distribution of our team's impact around the world: 
http://kivafolio.appspot.com/report?user=indiana

To see a map showing where Indiana team members are located, click the link below.

teams.loan_because: The people who are lucky enough to live in Toronto care about creating a self sustaining legacy in all parts of civilization, and wish that economic conditions in more of the world could be like they are here.
teams.description: This team began with one person, but soon gained strength and momentum through the generosity of the people of Toronto, Canada and their friends. Now this team has over 300 members, has loaned hundreds of thousands of dollars over the past six years and is helping people all over the world. Join us today!!

teams.name: Graffiti Couture
teams.loan_because: We loan in order to assist those whom have been placed, by society at large, in dubious living situations, and have decided it's time to try anyway.
teams.description: A team of business people, clothing designers, artists, and computer geeks, creating hip street wear clothing, for the fun of it......!

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: 43things
teams.description: We're all fans of the website 43things...

teams.name: A Brighter Future
teams.loan_because: We would like to help people improve their quality of life.
teams.description: We view this as a simple, small way to help people around the world.

teams.name: Ubuntu
teams.loan_because: Ubuntu: 1) An ancient African word meaning 'humanity to others' or 'I am what I am because of who we all are'.
teams.description:
Ubuntu: 2) A Linux based operating system that powers desktops, servers, netbooks and laptops; bringing the spirit of Ubuntu to the world of computers.

This is a team for the Ubuntu Linux community to show our support of microcredit and Ubuntu.

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: Companies That Care
teams.loan_because: We know what a difference it can make to lend even just a small portion of working capital to people in need.
teams.description:
The "Companies That Care" lending team is for businesses, organizations and individuals who are dedicated to creating opportunities and prosperity
for the world's poor.

teams.name: Portugal
teams.loan_because:
Honramos o legado deixado pelos nossos antepassados que espalharam cultura, conhecimento e valores por todo o mundo. Onde há um português, há um amigo pronto a ajudar e dar esperança aos que mais precisam. Isto é Portugal.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
We honor the legacy of our ancestors who spread our culture, knowledge and values around the world. Wherever there is a Portuguese, there is a friend willing to help and give hope to those in need. This is Portugal.
teams.description: Portuguese Lenders Team

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Catholic Kiva
teams.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
teams.description: Anyone is welcome to join our group.  The team is just for fun and to help build community.

teams.name: go global
teams.loan_because: we care
teams.description: we want to change the world... one tiny bit everyday!

teams.name: Humanitas
teams.loan_because:
Esta equipa celebra a vida, o ser humano e a lusofonia.
A intenção desta equipa é a de unir as pessoas em torno deste capital comum. Defendemos os empréstimos a 0% de juro como uma forma de gerar emprego sustentável e esperamos desta forma incentivar o nascimento de movimentos de microcrédito por todo o mundo lusófono.

Todos são convidados a entrar. O nosso objectivo é chegarmos aos 100 mil membros no fim do ano. Se apenas 10% tiver feito um empréstimo teremos gerado 250 mil dólares em menos de um ano. Imaginam a quantidade de vidas que podem mudar neste processo?
teams.description:
A origem do nome da equipa vem de Machado de Assis:

"- Queres ser meu discípulo?
- Quero.
- Bem, irás entendendo aos poucos a minha filosofia; no dia em que a houveres penetrado inteiramente, ah! nesse dia terás o maior prazer da vida, porque não há vinho que embriague como a verdade. Crê-me, o Humanitismo é o remate das cousas; e eu que o formulei, sou o maior homem do mundo.
Olha, vês como o meu bom Quincas Borba está olhando para mim? Não é
ele, é Humanitas...
- Mas que Humanitas é esse?
- Humanitas é o princípio. Há nas cousas todas certa substância recôndita e idêntica, um princípio único, universal, eterno, comum, indivisível e indestrutível, - ou, para usar a linguagem do grande Camões:

Uma verdade que nas cousas anda 
Que mora no visíbil e no invisíbil.

Pois essa substância ou verdade, esse princípio indestrutível é que é Humanitas. Assim lhe chamo, porque resume o universo, e o universo é o homem. Vais entendendo?"

teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Guys holding fish
teams.loan_because: We feel an affinity for entrepreneurs that make their living by fishing, selling fish, or attempting to make their lives better because of their proximity to the ocean, or freshwater locales...
teams.description:
We love fish and/or fishing so much that many of us have chosen to present ourselves on KIVA with a photo of ourselves, holding a fish!  We welcome "gals" to join, as well, the name of the team notwithstanding...  

We certainly support "sustainable" fishing, but also recognize that sometimes, our "Western" views of resource management may not match the needs of the very desperate folks, in other countries, struggling to make a living, or even providing food for their families ...  Our intent is to help the struggling, without regard to their profession or trade.  We believe that our lending record well represents that goal, as we are a pretty diverse group, with very diverse lending interests....

teams.name: Kiva Mormons
teams.loan_because: "A man filled with the love of God is not content with blessing his family alone, but ranges through the whole world, anxious to bless the whole human race." ~ Joseph Smith

teams.name: Safe World for Women
teams.loan_because:
We are a voluntary organisation set up to help empower women and children throughout the world.
Our objectives include promoting trust and empathy between women from diverse cultures, and researching, developing and supporting sustainable projects that transform women’s lives through addressing the root causes of poverty and suffering. .

“70% of the poor in the world are women.” 

Nora Castaneda – Women’s Development bank of Venezuela.

“Much of women’s work is not underpaid, it is entirely unpaid…
The enormous demands of unpaid work reduce many women’s opportunities to participate in the paid workforce”
"Women’s unpaid labour subsidises the economy”, Penny Kome.

“It is estimated that women perform 66% of the world’s work, but earn 10% of the income, and own less than 1% of the world’s property” United Nations Children’s Fund.

"There is no policy more effective in promoting development, health and education than the empowerment of women and girls.
And I would venture that no policy is more important in preventing conflict, or in achieving reconciliation after a conflict has ended".
United Nations, Secretary General.
teams.description:
We are a multicultural, grassroots organisation, staffed by a team of over 30 volunteers from 6 continents. We work together online in a 'virtual' office. We have a fast-growing network of over 25,000 supporters from throughout the world.
We have many contacts and are keen to help support women in developing sustainable projects. We are building a database of women's groups and case studies of successful projects and are keen to hear from anyone who is able to help contribute to this.

teams.name: Christine's family and friends
teams.loan_because: Christine would like to live in a better world.
teams.description: Christine would only like loans with a portfolio yield below 35%. She doesn't want to be part of the problem, she wants to be part of the solution.

teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Crazy Canucks
teams.loan_because: We live in a well-to-do nation and want to help those less fortunate than ourselves
teams.description: We are CANADIAN !!!

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
teams.loan_because:
"Thou shalt share, that none may seek without funding."   A nod to VII.  of “RANDOM NUMBER OF NOT COMMANDMENTS, SUGGESTIONS"  in the LOOSE CANON:
http://www.loose-canon.info/page17.htm
teams.description:
Members of the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster  

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

For Kiva tips and who knows what the FSM will move us to add for mutual benefit & merriment:  
http://flyingspaghettikivans.blogspot.it/    

and
  https://www.facebook.com/pages/FlyingSpaghettiKivans

teams.name: New York City
teams.loan_because: we live in the most beautiful city in the world, so hey, it's probably time to give back...

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Kiva Austin Texas
teams.loan_because: We are big-hearted Texans and citizens of the world who enjoy sharing our prosperity and making a positive difference in the world.
teams.description:
a delightfully diverse group of Austinites. Be proud, Team Austin--our Kiva team is second only to NYC (with nearly 4X as many members!) for total lending for a city team. 
And a hearty WELCOME!! to all our new members.

teams.name: Presbyterian Kiva
teams.loan_because: We can.
teams.description: Group of committed Presbyterians who believe that Kiva is a good way to help people.

teams.name: Cheeseheads For Change
teams.loan_because: If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day.  Now in the modern world, you can give that same man a loan to buy a fishing pole, he catches fish with his new pole to feed his family, his community improves because of his financial success, he pays the loan back, and  you can re-loan that money again to help someone else buy a fishing pole . . . wait, that sounds like a conspiracy by the Rapala Corporation to sell more fishing equipment, what are we supporting here ;-)
teams.description: Our Kiva lending team is a non-political group consisting of Green Bay Packers fans lovingly known as Cheeseheads, and anyone who lives in or has ties to the great state of Wisconsin and is interested in making the world a better place.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Spokane
teams.loan_because: “Be the change you want to see in the world.” - Mahatma Gandhi
teams.description: People who live or have lived in Spokane, Washington.  People who have run Bloomsday or played in Hoopfest!  Join our "Near Nature Near Perfect" team to donate loans that change lives.

teams.name: Holm Base
teams.loan_because: Sometimes all you need is a little encouragement, and a little help, to realize dreams.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

Toolkit for analyzing Kiva data:
http://build.kiva.org/

teams.name: Credituga
teams.loan_because: we're just a bunch of good honest working tugas. So we don't have much to ourselves anyway. And this makes the whole thing much more interesting.
teams.description:
This team joins friends and co-workers, some of them have been brute forced into Kiva has there were no other available  way of making them understand that, as a good broke tuga, your destiny is to share with people with less resources. 
This was just the beginning...
 We invite everybody that shares the tuga spirit to join our team.

teams.name: Portugal
teams.loan_because:
Honramos o legado deixado pelos nossos antepassados que espalharam cultura, conhecimento e valores por todo o mundo. Onde há um português, há um amigo pronto a ajudar e dar esperança aos que mais precisam. Isto é Portugal.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
We honor the legacy of our ancestors who spread our culture, knowledge and values around the world. Wherever there is a Portuguese, there is a friend willing to help and give hope to those in need. This is Portugal.
teams.description: Portuguese Lenders Team
